grade: Jōyō kanji, taught in junior high
on reading compounds: 浄化槽【ジョウカソウ】water-purification tank, septic tank
浄化【ジョウカ】purification, cleanup (e.g. of politics), purge
不浄【フジョウ】uncleanliness, dirtiness, impurity, filthiness, defilement, menses, feces (faeces), bathroom
kun reading compounds: 清める【きよめる】to purify, to cleanse, to exorcise, to purge, to ward off
